::Zardus/Bloodystrike::

Bloodystrike runs off after Skulletron, heading for the mess hall.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus's hand slides down to Feline's side, petting lightly. He turns his 
head as Bloodystrike walks in.

"Zardus, this is Skulletron," Bloodystrike says, pointing to Skulletron, 
"Skulletron, this is Zardus."

Zardus stands up, keeping his hand on Feline and looking at Skulletron. 
"Welcome to the Alliance, Skulletron. I assume Bloodystrike gave you a tour?"
